narrations.content: The yellow shapes have been used to do some printing. You are going to work out what they printed. Click on the yellow shape you want to try first.
If you are both happy with your choice click 'Next'.
Drag the prints into the box that you think were made by the yellow shape. There may be one or many.
Click 'Check' when you are both happy with your answer.
Thats not right. Talk about how to change your answer and try again.
You didn't find the right answer this time. Click 'Next' to find out why.
Well done, you found one correct print but there is another. Keep trying.
One of these prints is correct. Talk about which you need to change and then try again.
Some of these prints are correct. Talk about which you need to change and then try again.
Fantastic you found all the correct prints.
Click the play button to see how this shape makes a print.
Great, you found the correct print.
One of these prints is correct. Talk about which you need to to take out and then try again.
Two of these prints are correct. Talk about which you need to to take out and then try again.
Well done you found two correct prints but there is another. Keep trying.
Three of these prints are correct. Talk about which you need to to take out and then try again.
Well done, you found one correct print but there are more. Keep trying.
Well done, you found two correct prints but there are more. Keep trying.
Well done, you found three correct prints but there are more. Keep trying.
Well done, you found four correct prints but there is another. Keep trying.
Five of these prints are correct. Talk about which you need to to take out and then try again.
Which yellow shapes do you want to choose next? Click on it to continue.

square.demoText: A cube, a blank piece of paper, and a tray containing colored solution are next to one another.
square.playText: The cube is dipped in the colored solution and pressed onto the blank paper in 3 different ways. The paper now has 3 prints which are a short line, a small square, and a point.

rect.demoText: A rectangular prism, blank piece of paper, and a tray containing colored solution are below the other.
rect.playText: The rectangular prism is dipped in the colored solution and pressed onto the blank paper in 5 different ways. The paper now has 5 prints which are a short line, a small square, a point, a large rectangle, and a long line.

circle.demoText: A sphere, a blank piece of paper, and a tray containing colored solution are next to one another.
circle.playText: The sphere is dipped in the colored solution and pressed onto the blank paper once. The paper now has 1 print which is a small circle.

cylinder.demoText: A cylinder, a blank piece of paper, and a tray containing colored solution are next to one another.
cylinder.playText: The cylinder is dipped in the colored solution and pressed onto the blank paper in 2 different ways. The paper now has 2 prints which are a large circle and small rectangle.

polygon.altText: Two pyramids sharing a common base
polygon.demoText: Two pyramids sharing a common base, a blank piece of paper, and a tray containing colored solution are next to one another.
polygon.playText: The two pyramids sharing a common base are dipped in the colored solution and pressed onto the blank paper in 3 different ways. The paper now has 3 prints which are a point, a small triangle, and a short line.

cone.demoText: A pyramid, a blank piece of paper, and a tray containing colored solution are next to one another.
cone.playText: The pyramid is dipped in the colored solution and pressed onto the blank paper in 5 different ways. The paper now has 5 prints which are a medium line, a long line, a large square, a large triangle, and a point.

altText.blue_square2: Blue print of a small square
altText.blue_line2: Blue print of a small line
altText.blue_cone: Blue print of a large cone
altText.blue_line1: Blue print of a medium line
altText.blue_line3: Blue print of a small rectangle
altText.green_circle: Green print of a large circle
altText.green_rect: Green print of a large rectangle
altText.green_triangle: Green print of a small triangle
altText.green_line: Green print of a long line
altText.green_circle2: Green print of a small circle
